name: Martyn Bennett
description: '''Martyn Bennett''' (17 February 1971 â€“ 30 January 2005) was a Canadian-Scottish musician who was influential in the evolution of modern [[Celtic fusion]], a blending of traditional [[Celtic music|Celtic]] and modern music. He was a piper, violinist, composer and producer. Diagnosis of serious illness at the age of thirty curtailed his live performances, although he completed a further two albums in the studio. He died from cancer in 2005, fifteen months after the release of his fifth album ''[[Grit (Martyn Bennett album)|Grit]]''.
